org.openscience.cdk.graph.invariant

Class EquivalentClassPartitioner

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.openscience.cdk.graph.invariant.EquivalentClassPartitioner

  • public class EquivalentClassPartitioner
extends Object
    An algorithm for topological symmetry. This algorithm derived from the algorithm [Hu, C.Y. and Xu, L., Algorithm for computer perception of topological symmetry, Analytical Chimica Acta, 1994, 295:127].
    Author:
    Junfeng Hao
    Created on:
    2003-09-24
    Dictionary pointer(s):
    perceiveGraphSymmetry in the Blue Obelisk Chemoinformatics Dictionary [blue-obelisk:perceiveGraphSymmetry]
    Source code:
    HEAD

        public double[] prepareNode(AtomContainer atomContainer)

        Parameters:

        Returns:
